.class public auto ansi sealed InsertedTextHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the InsertedTextHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the InsertedTextHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the InsertedTextHandler is removed from the event.
